question: In which year was the historic center of Évora, Portugal, declared a UNESCO World Heritage site?
asked_question_translated: In which year was the historic center of Évora, Portugal, declared a UNESCO World Heritage site?
answer: The historic center of Évora, Portugal, was declared a UNESCO World Heritage site in 1986.
answer_translated_eng: The historic center of Évora, Portugal, was declared a UNESCO World Heritage site in 1986.
